text: The canton of Attignat is an administrative division of the Ain department, in eastern France. It was created at the French canton reorganisation which came into effect in March 2015. Its seat is in Attignat.Décret n° 2014-147 du 13 février 2014 portant délimitation des cantons dans le département de l'Ain ==Composition== It consists of the following communes: #Attignat #Béréziat #Bresse Vallons #Buellas #Confrançon #Curtafond #Foissiat #Jayat #Malafretaz #Marsonnas #Montcet #Montracol #Montrevel-en-Bresse #Polliat #Saint- Didier-d'Aussiat #Saint-Martin-le-Châtel #Saint-Sulpice #Vandeins ==Councillors== {| class="wikitable" |- !colspan="2"|Election!!Councillors!!Party!!Occupation |- |style="background- color: "| | 2015 | Clotilde Fournier | DVD | Mayor of Saint-Sulpice |- |style="background-color: " | | 2015 | Walter Martin | DVD | Mayor of Attignat |} ==Pictures of the canton== {| |Loriol Castle in Confrançon |Manoir de la Charme in Montrevel-en-Bresse |Castle of Salvert in Attignat |} ==References== Category:Cantons of Ain
title: Canton of Attignat
